name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"eb2b66cd-a4df-43fa-9616-1801bb26c1a2","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class Documentation: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeItem","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d1c75072-ed8f-4169-a296-a881f7038c8f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" class represents a collection of value-flow updates for a specific definition. It acts as a timeline of "points" where a variable or symbol's points-to set changes. By inheriting from ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Definition","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it integrates into the system's broader understanding of code identifiers, adding the ability to track how those identifiers evolve across different lines of code.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8fd14baf-2ef7-4ce3-bcd3-0f837fee5766","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"09a42f36-2309-4160-82c3-c246b266a8b4","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attributes","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ae8eae37-897b-4ce7-9ec0-c50a9eecbb4c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"points","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"list","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): A min-heap (managed via ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"heapq","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PointItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects. This maintains a chronologically ordered sequence of value assignments based on their line numbers.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1b26633f-f149-488f-9e35-7e6b22c6f833","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"bias","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"set","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): An internal set used to track specific influences or constraints on the definition (used during advanced propagation logic).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4ea814a0-ba93-41bd-83b6-3f94a08dbade","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"if_union","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"bool","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"): A flag indicating the merge strategy. If ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", new values should be unioned with existing ones; if ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"False","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", they might overwrite or supplement based on the manager's logic.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8e2c7b8a-cf44-46e9-9fad-0760fc8e3dde","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"9d75b2af-7cad-47ab-9cdc-c1ce0bf1ac9b","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Methods","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7e95d8b2-b69a-44b5-837b-41c79d13d4d4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"__init__(row, values, if_union=False)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Initializes a new change record.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"f0397a43-db0d-480a-94b5-2674c03f4cc3","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"row","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The initial line number where the change occurs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f1fa941c-5341-4c88-b74a-50037fce802f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"values","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The points-to set associated with this change.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0d028ab8-f98b-46ee-8a9a-0bdbe358fed6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"if_union","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Determines the semantic behavior of how this change interacts with existing state.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fdae0e83-5a8f-4ad8-bd9f-4cc2f5c9514d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Note","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":": It automatically calls an internal registration method (like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_value_point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"addPoint","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to establish the first state.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"ed2ded0d-fc58-4624-a699-31e42d26c18c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"addPoint(row, values)
","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Adds a new temporal point to the change history.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"b21e1747-0743-409c-b8f2-129f6667bea8","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PointItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"heapq.heappush","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to insert it into the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"points","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" list. This ensures that even if points are added out of order, the list remains sorted by line number for efficient traversal.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"437d5c79-8cbc-4746-9e28-be4c25745385","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"536d6bf9-afa9-4c7b-b11b-7938bc33e7ab","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Usage Example","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"85387722-c05b-4fbe-8f96-e17a4f96e80a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is used when the analyzer needs to record that a variable's meaning changed at a specific point in the code.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e5af9264-8cf6-4802-9ca7-a7428b6ca3a4","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"import heapq
from points import ChangeItem

# 1. Create a change item starting at line 5
# Variable 'cfg' points to 'default_config' at line 5
change = ChangeItem(row=5, values="default_config", if_union=True)

# 2. Add a subsequent change at line 12
# Later in the code, 'cfg' also points to 'user_config'
change.addPoint(row=12, values="user_config")

# 3. Accessing points in order
# Because they are stored in a heap, the smallest row is always at index 0
# or can be retrieved in order using heapq.heappop
while change.points:
    p = heapq.heappop(change.points)
    print(f"At line {p.row}, points to: {p.points_to}")

# Output:
# At line 5, points to: {'default_config'}
# At line 12, points to: {'user_config'}","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c6965bca-2492-45c1-b32c-9c38cfebbc99","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Insights","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"52bc246e-3bb3-4ba5-892d-9b235797da7c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Heap-Based Sorting","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": By using a heap to store ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"PointItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" objects, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"ChangeItem","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" guarantees that analysis always processes changes in the order they occur in the source file, which is vital for accurate data-flow reconstruction.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"52c0705c-4619-4e8d-80d0-9106a6198fdb","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Propagation Logic","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"if_union","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" flag is a key differentiator in static analysis; it tells the engine whether an assignment at a new line completely replaces the old values or simply adds to the list of possibilities.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0be667dc-8c66-4cd3-9777-374b7ca4dd2b","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Definition Linkage","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":": Because this class typically represents the "life" of a specific variable, it allows Jarvis to maintain a granular history of a variable's state instead of just its final value.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8a7c8038-365d-450d-8cf7-2541684a2c03","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
